scripts.preversion:
git fetch; UPSTREAM=${1:-'@{u}'}; LOCAL=$(git rev-parse @); REMOTE=$(git rev-parse "$UPSTREAM"); if [ $LOCAL != $REMOTE ]; then echo "\033[0;31mYour local git repo is not in sync with remote. pull or push or do something like that first.\033[0m
"; exit 1; fi; echo $npm_config_argv;[[ `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` =~ ^release-*|main ]] || { printf '%s\n' "Not a release or main branch" >&2; exit 1; }; printf "new version from branch: \e[42m`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`\e[0m%s\n";
scripts.version: cd cargo-publish; cargo bump $npm_package_version; git add -A Cargo.toml
